DEMO_517_MSG_010: ́Ay dios mio! You've returned! Am I sensing correctly that you've regained the ability to Aerial Ride!?
DEMO_517_MSG_020:
́Ah, so you were instructed to find the Resistance's secretbase? I had no idea such a thing existed!
ā
DEMO_517_MSG_030: ́It's hidden just over in that direction, no? Hmm...
DEMO_517_MSG_040: ́Hondele, amigo! Hop on! Hold on tight! Let's go find that secret base!
DEMO_517_MSG_060: ́Bueno! We've arrived, Señor Anses! Now, go uncover that secret base!
